page.title: 19Wallingford. Western edge.
page.content:
{Fir Tree Junior School} has about 180 children on roll. Its Headteacher Mr M. Neave was appointed in 1984 and tells us he enjoys working with the children at the school.
{St. Nicholas Infant School} in St Nicholas Road takes children from 5 years to 7 years. Its Headteacher is Mrs V. Taylor. The Wallingford Nursery School is also housed at the Infant School site and the Nursery Head is Miss J. Gaines. Children usually move from St. Nicholas School to Fir Tree School at the age of 7.
